get

public LocalObjectStoreInterface get(java.lang.String key,
                                     int ttl)
                              throws LocalStoreException
Description copied from class: BaseObjectStore
Gets an object from the localstore making sure that its timestamp is within the expiry timeframe i.e. timestamp + ttl < currentTime If ttl=0, then DEFAULT_TTL is used.

Specified by:
get in interface ObjectStoreInterface
Specified by:
get in class BaseObjectStore
Returns:

_clean

public void _clean()
Description copied from class: JLD_Object
Derived classes should handle this if special "cleaning" is required when the object is retrieved from the ObjectPool before being handed-off to the requesting party. Also, derived classes which use "object composition" should _clean also their composing objects.

Overrides:
_clean in class JLD_Object
